summary.span: 處理 XML 結構描述中的項目和屬性名稱，並選擇性地驗證 XML 結構描述。

span.span: Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列清單識別的情況下會方法呼叫：The following list identifies situations in which the method is called: - 藉由類別建立時從識別為 Web 服務的類別的物件。By the class while creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services. - Wsdl.exe 工具或類別，產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別，從 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件時。By the Wsdl.exe tool or the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. - 所產生的 XML 結構描述從組件中找到的類型時，Xsd.exe 工具。By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies. 而不是呼叫方法直接，使用先前所述的類別或工具。Instead of calling the method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.
